original:
N-now now, let's just settle 
down... alright? Just do your best.
translation:
N-now now, let's just settle 
down... alright? Just do your best.

original: Jeez...
translation: Jeez...

original:
Hey little Demi! Just wait a moment,
please?!
translation:
Hey little Demi! Just wait a moment,
please?!

original:
Stop following me, you stupid
Tamers!
Just you wait! Once I Digivolve...

Once I Digivolve, you're in for a 
world of hurt!
translation:
Stop following me, you stupid
Tamers!
Just you wait! Once I Digivolve...

Once I Digivolve, you're in for a 
world of hurt!

original:
Enough already!

Just what's up with that guy?!
I'm at my wit's end, here!
translation:
Enough already!

Just what's up with that guy?!
I'm at my wit's end, here!

original:
But that little Demi...

Does he really plan on fighting us
once he manages to Digivolve...?
translation:
But that little Demi...

Does he really plan on fighting us
once he manages to Digivolve...?

original:
Enough of this, you stupid little
Demi!
Just stop and listen to us for a 
second, okay?!
translation:
Enough of this, you stupid little
Demi!
Just stop and listen to us for a 
second, okay?!

original:
Who'd ever listen to anything you
dumb Tamers have to say, huh?!
There's no way I'll be caught by 
the likes of you!
Just you wait 'til I can finally
Digivolve...
Then you'll be in for it!
translation:
Who'd ever listen to anything you
dumb Tamers have to say, huh?!
There's no way I'll be caught by 
the likes of you!
Just you wait 'til I can finally
Digivolve...
Then you'll be in for it!

original:
He's running away again? I just
cannot believe this guy!
Argh!
translation:
He's running away again? I just
cannot believe this guy!
Argh!

original:
Saying he's gonna Digivolve, but...
who does he think is helping him?
translation:
Saying he's gonna Digivolve, but...
who does he think is helping him?

original:
...I just had a thought that's
making me really uneasy...
translation:
...I just had a thought that's
making me really uneasy...

original:
Now that we've put the Plate back
into the Evolution tree...
Doesn't that mean little Demi really
is able to Digivolve, now?
While it's great he'll finally be able
to Digivolve like he wants...
I'm worried about what kind of
Digimon he might become...
translation:
Now that we've put the Plate back
into the Evolution tree...
Doesn't that mean little Demi really
is able to Digivolve, now?
While it's great he'll finally be able
to Digivolve like he wants...
I'm worried about what kind of
Digimon he might become...

original:
Well I guess there's no point 
worrying about it. Let's go see...
translation:
Well I guess there's no point 
worrying about it. Let's go see...

original:
Whoa... Is that him?

He turned into something quite 
impressive looking, but...
translation:
Whoa... Is that him?

He turned into something quite 
impressive looking, but...

original:
You guys again! Why do you keep 
following me?!
translation:
You guys again! Why do you keep 
following me?!

original:
Hey, you're the same DemiDevimon
from before, right?
translation:
Hey, you're the same DemiDevimon
from before, right?

original:
So what if I am?!

No matter how many times you try,
you're not gonna change my mind!
translation:
So what if I am?!

No matter how many times you try,
you're not gonna change my mind!

original:
Forget about changing your mind! 
Look, if we win this fight...
we win the Black Box, alright, 
Ex-Demi!?
translation:
Forget about changing your mind! 
Look, if we win this fight...
we win the Black Box, alright, 
Ex-Demi!?

original:
Stop calling me Demi!

There's no doubt I'll win, but 
what's in it for me...?
translation:
Stop calling me Demi!

There's no doubt I'll win, but 
what's in it for me...?

original:
If we lose, you can do whatever 
you want to us.
Boil us, burn us, steam us, fry us, 
do whatever you want!
translation:
If we lose, you can do whatever 
you want to us.
Boil us, burn us, steam us, fry us, 
do whatever you want!

original: I'll make sure you remember that!
translation: I'll make sure you remember that!

original:
^P...
I believe in you, alright?
translation:
^P...
I believe in you, alright?

original:
We did it!
Great job, ^P!
To be honest, I was a little 
nervous...!
translation:
We did it!
Great job, ^P!
To be honest, I was a little 
nervous...!

original:
Now then, as promised, hand over 
the Black Box!
translation:
Now then, as promised, hand over 
the Black Box!

original:
...Hmph!

If you want it so much, then here,
just take it!
translation:
...Hmph!

If you want it so much, then here,
just take it!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Hey, little Demi?

Do you still want to find your 
Tamer, after all this time?
translation:
Hey, little Demi?

Do you still want to find your 
Tamer, after all this time?

original:
Still? I never said I wanted to find
him!
I don't want to! And I never 
wanted to!
I don't want anything to do with 
him! Now leave me alone!
translation:
Still? I never said I wanted to find
him!
I don't want to! And I never 
wanted to!
I don't want anything to do with 
him! Now leave me alone!

original:
I see... Then let me tell you 
something.
Your... I mean, Devimon's 
DigiPlate, you see...
It's been missing from the Tree
for a very long time.
But we found it, and we put it back
in the Tree where it belongs.
We found it in the DigiPort, which
had been locked for a long time.
translation:
I see... Then let me tell you 
something.
Your... I mean, Devimon's 
DigiPlate, you see...
It's been missing from the Tree
for a very long time.
But we found it, and we put it back
in the Tree where it belongs.
We found it in the DigiPort, which
had been locked for a long time.

original:
You know, it must have been your
partner who left it there.
Because then, even if the tree was
destroyed... you'd remain safe.
translation:
You know, it must have been your
partner who left it there.
Because then, even if the tree was
destroyed... you'd remain safe.

original:
I find that hard to believe...

Besides, after that, he just used 
that DigiPort to escape, didn't he?
translation:
I find that hard to believe...

Besides, after that, he just used 
that DigiPort to escape, didn't he?

original:
You're the one who ran! You have 
no idea what's going on!
It's your fault for not doing 
anything about it!
If you had just investigated their 
disappearance, you'd know!
You'd know it wasn't just your 
partner who disappeared,
that every Tamer in the Digital 
World has vanished.
They're probably being held 
somewhere, unable to escape!
translation:
You're the one who ran! You have 
no idea what's going on!
It's your fault for not doing 
anything about it!
If you had just investigated their 
disappearance, you'd know!
You'd know it wasn't just your 
partner who disappeared,
that every Tamer in the Digital 
World has vanished.
They're probably being held 
somewhere, unable to escape!

original:
We're going to South Bridge in 
order to find our friends.
Unlike you, we won't quit until we
find them.
But that's why we'll search for 
your partner, as well, for you.
If you happen to have any clues,
you'd better let us know now.
translation:
We're going to South Bridge in 
order to find our friends.
Unlike you, we won't quit until we
find them.
But that's why we'll search for 
your partner, as well, for you.
If you happen to have any clues,
you'd better let us know now.

original: ...Annoying.
translation: ...Annoying.

original: What?
translation: What?

original:
...If you find an annoying Tamer,
that's probably Bibir.
With his annoying laugh, 
his irritating way of speaking.
His terrible comedic sense, and his
tendency to burst into laughter.
He's an obscene idiot with a bad 
mouth and personality, and yet...
... ... ... ... ... ...
... ... ... ... ... ...
...And yet, we're partners. For 
better or for worse.
translation:
...If you find an annoying Tamer,
that's probably Bibir.
With his annoying laugh, 
his irritating way of speaking.
His terrible comedic sense, and his
tendency to burst into laughter.
He's an obscene idiot with a bad 
mouth and personality, and yet...
... ... ... ... ... ...
... ... ... ... ... ...
...And yet, we're partners. For 
better or for worse.

original:
...Got it! Just leave it to us!

It'll be alright, we'll find him 
for sure!
See you later!
translation:
...Got it! Just leave it to us!

It'll be alright, we'll find him 
for sure!
See you later!

original: ...Wait.
translation: ...Wait.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
The area ahead is locked, so
Tamers can't enter.
...but it's not like I need the key 
anymore.
translation:
The area ahead is locked, so
Tamers can't enter.
...but it's not like I need the key 
anymore.

original: T-thank you, Devimon!
translation: T-thank you, Devimon!

original:
Let's go, ^P!

Let's get going and return this
Black Box to the DigiBase!
translation:
Let's go, ^P!

Let's get going and return this
Black Box to the DigiBase!

original:
Oh, ^P! Asuka! 
Great timing!
I was just about to call you
through the Digivice!
translation:
Oh, ^P! Asuka! 
Great timing!
I was just about to call you
through the Digivice!

original: What's wrong? What's happened?
translation: What's wrong? What's happened?

original:
An ally of ours has gotten into a 
fight with the Bandits!
They're at Login Mountain!
Please, you need to go help them!
translation:
An ally of ours has gotten into a 
fight with the Bandits!
They're at Login Mountain!
Please, you need to go help them!

original:
Oh, and as for the Black Box you 
brought back, 
we managed to install it into the 
DigiShip. It's all ready to go!
You can use it to get to places 
with open DigiPorts now.
translation:
Oh, and as for the Black Box you 
brought back, 
we managed to install it into the 
DigiShip. It's all ready to go!
You can use it to get to places 
with open DigiPorts now.

original:
Hey, wait a second. 'We'? As in,
including you, Hiroyuki???
What are you doing messing with 
the DigiShip?
translation:
Hey, wait a second. 'We'? As in,
including you, Hiroyuki???
What are you doing messing with 
the DigiShip?

original:
Heheh... Haven't you noticed yet?

I'm of a different class to the likes 
of you...
Because I am a Super Multi 
Operator Supporter...!
translation:
Heheh... Haven't you noticed yet?

I'm of a different class to the likes 
of you...
Because I am a Super Multi 
Operator Supporter...!

original:
Well, Hiroyuki might call himself
'Super' something,
but in reality he's just a helper to
Gatomon and Patamon.
Don't worry, we're keeping an eye
on him.
translation:
Well, Hiroyuki might call himself
'Super' something,
but in reality he's just a helper to
Gatomon and Patamon.
Don't worry, we're keeping an eye
on him.

original:
Well, I guess at least it's not as 
dangerous as his "Tamer dream"?
Alright then, we'll leave it to you!
translation:
Well, I guess at least it's not as 
dangerous as his "Tamer dream"?
Alright then, we'll leave it to you!

original: Don't mess with me!
translation: Don't mess with me!

original: Hey, ^P... What... is that?
translation: Hey, ^P... What... is that?

original:
I won't forgive you for what you've
come here to do!
Stealing DigiPlates! Kidnapping 
Digimon!
Destroying the Evolution Tree,
bringing ruin to the Digital World...
And worst of all, you're the ones 
who summoned the Erasers here!
No matter how many of you there
are...
I, HerculesKabuterimon, 
shall not lose to the likes of you!
translation:
I won't forgive you for what you've
come here to do!
Stealing DigiPlates! Kidnapping 
Digimon!
Destroying the Evolution Tree,
bringing ruin to the Digital World...
And worst of all, you're the ones 
who summoned the Erasers here!
No matter how many of you there
are...
I, HerculesKabuterimon, 
shall not lose to the likes of you!

original:
I don't quite understand what's 
going on here, but...
It appears that Digimon is trying to
stop the Bandits, like us, right?
Then why don't we stay here and
cheer it on?♪
translation:
I don't quite understand what's 
going on here, but...
It appears that Digimon is trying to
stop the Bandits, like us, right?
Then why don't we stay here and
cheer it on?♪

original:
...Hm?!

Have you no shame? Calling
more of your underlings like this!
translation:
...Hm?!

Have you no shame? Calling
more of your underlings like this!

original: Huh? Underlings? Who??
translation: Huh? Underlings? Who??

original:
...Goodness, this old codger.

He just doesn't understand. 
Not even willing to talk it out. 
I'll leave the rest to you, underlings!
translation:
...Goodness, this old codger.

He just doesn't understand. 
Not even willing to talk it out. 
I'll leave the rest to you, underlings!

original: H-hey, wait...? What's going on!?
translation: H-hey, wait...? What's going on!?

original:
Hmph, I see. You sure are 
confident in yourselves.
You think you can stand in my way,
huh?
translation:
Hmph, I see. You sure are 
confident in yourselves.
You think you can stand in my way,
huh?

original:
Now wait a minute, you've got
this all wrong.
This is all a misunderstanding,
so let's just calm down, alright?
translation:
Now wait a minute, you've got
this all wrong.
This is all a misunderstanding,
so let's just calm down, alright?

original:
I'll show you...

The true meaning of fear!
translation:
I'll show you...

The true meaning of fear!

original:
Can't you just listen to us?! 
Oh dear... here he comes!
translation:
Can't you just listen to us?! 
Oh dear... here he comes!

original:
What's this...?

You guys don't appear to be with
the Selectors after all.
translation:
What's this...?

You guys don't appear to be with
the Selectors after all.

original:
That's what I've been trying to 
tell you!
We've been saying that from the 
very beginning, haven't we?
translation:
That's what I've been trying to 
tell you!
We've been saying that from the 
very beginning, haven't we?

original:
Then what are you doing all the way
out here?
translation:
Then what are you doing all the way
out here?

original:
We heard an ally was in trouble, so
we came to help.
The Digimon from the DigiBase
asked us to!
translation:
We heard an ally was in trouble, so
we came to help.
The Digimon from the DigiBase
asked us to!

original:
Ah... I see. Then I must say you've
done a good job.
Here, take these.

They're Bug Plates I took from 
those Bandits.
translation:
Ah... I see. Then I must say you've
done a good job.
Here, take these.

They're Bug Plates I took from 
those Bandits.

original:
Obtained Bug Plate!
？？？？？？？？
translation:
Obtained Bug Plate!
？？？？？？？？

original:
Obtained Bug Plate!
？？？？？？？？
translation:
Obtained Bug Plate!
？？？？？？？？

original:
Huh? You took them yourself?
Nice work!
translation:
Huh? You took them yourself?
Nice work!

original:
...'Nice work' you say. It would
be... but I didn't get them back.
Those guys brought the plates 
here and gave them to me.
They told me to return them to 
the Evolution Tree.
Were they mocking me...!?
translation:
...'Nice work' you say. It would
be... but I didn't get them back.
Those guys brought the plates 
here and gave them to me.
They told me to return them to 
the Evolution Tree.
Were they mocking me...!?

original:
Wait, what...? Normally they show
up to steal things.
Why would they come here in order
to return something?
translation:
Wait, what...? Normally they show
up to steal things.
Why would they come here in order
to return something?

original:
Who knows? I have absolutely no
clue how those Bandits think.
translation:
Who knows? I have absolutely no
clue how those Bandits think.

original:
...Alright then. Well, we'll take 
these with us.
We'll fix them at the DigiBase and 
place them on the Tree.
translation:
...Alright then. Well, we'll take 
these with us.
We'll fix them at the DigiBase and 
place them on the Tree.

original:
I'll leave them in your hands. 
That reminds me...
I heard you're headed to 
South Bridge. Is this true?
translation:
I'll leave them in your hands. 
That reminds me...
I heard you're headed to 
South Bridge. Is this true?

original:
In that case, once you reach 
South Bridge,
can I ask you to look into a place 
called 'Palace Laboratory'?
Many Tamers and Digimon have
entered that place...
but as of yet, none of them have 
ever returned.
translation:
In that case, once you reach 
South Bridge,
can I ask you to look into a place 
called 'Palace Laboratory'?
Many Tamers and Digimon have
entered that place...
but as of yet, none of them have 
ever returned.

original:
Understood. We'll take a look 
once we're in the area.
Although, if that's true, we may 
not be able to return, either...
translation:
Understood. We'll take a look 
once we're in the area.
Although, if that's true, we may 
not be able to return, either...

original:
If that happens... well, I suppose
that's just how life goes.
I hope you can instead find and 
rescue those who have been lost.
translation:
If that happens... well, I suppose
that's just how life goes.
I hope you can instead find and 
rescue those who have been lost.

original:
Alright, why don't we bring these 
Bug Plates back to the DigiBase?
translation:
Alright, why don't we bring these 
Bug Plates back to the DigiBase?

original:
Welcome back, ^P.

We're currently checking the data
within the Black Box.
translation:
Welcome back, ^P.

We're currently checking the data
within the Black Box.

original: And... how is it? Can we use it?
translation: And... how is it? Can we use it?

original:
Honestly, I can't say for sure yet. 
I need more time to study it. 
I'll do my best to hurry, but please 
wait just a little longer!
translation:
Honestly, I can't say for sure yet. 
I need more time to study it. 
I'll do my best to hurry, but please 
wait just a little longer!

original:
Wait a moment! Terriermon, even 
without the Black Box...
the DigiShip can still fly, right?
translation:
Wait a moment! Terriermon, even 
without the Black Box...
the DigiShip can still fly, right?

original:
Only to locations within North 
Bridge, with DigiPorts open.
Until we can safely install the Black
Box...
the DigiShip is unable to go beyond 
this island.
translation:
Only to locations within North 
Bridge, with DigiPorts open.
Until we can safely install the Black
Box...
the DigiShip is unable to go beyond 
this island.

original:
In other words, it's still impossible 
for us to reach South Bridge...
Alright, then while we wait, what 
should we do...?
translation:
In other words, it's still impossible 
for us to reach South Bridge...
Alright, then while we wait, what 
should we do...?

original: How about you clean the DigiLab?
translation: How about you clean the DigiLab?

original:
As I recall, that's YOUR job now!
Quit slacking off and get back to it!
translation:
As I recall, that's YOUR job now!
Quit slacking off and get back to it!

original:
Actually, I may have an idea.

That is, if you don't mind hearing
me out.
translation:
Actually, I may have an idea.

That is, if you don't mind hearing
me out.

original:
You see, there are many Digimon
who put out requests for help. 
They post these in the form of 
"Quests" for others to take. 
You can read and accept these 
Quests on the PC in your room.
So perhaps... we could ask you 
to help those Digimon for now?
If you do, more and more Digimon 
will start to open up to you.
translation:
You see, there are many Digimon
who put out requests for help. 
They post these in the form of 
"Quests" for others to take. 
You can read and accept these 
Quests on the PC in your room.
So perhaps... we could ask you 
to help those Digimon for now?
If you do, more and more Digimon 
will start to open up to you.

original:
That's a good idea! After all, we 
want them to trust us.
translation:
That's a good idea! After all, we 
want them to trust us.

original:
Then why don't you take on some
of those Quests?
If you do, I might be able to bring
myself to trust YOU for once.
translation:
Then why don't you take on some
of those Quests?
If you do, I might be able to bring
myself to trust YOU for once.

original:
Hey, it's not that no one trusts
you guys, so don't fret there.
It's just that Digimon are very shy
when it comes to meeting others.
But if you help them, you'll be able 
to make more and more friends.
translation:
Hey, it's not that no one trusts
you guys, so don't fret there.
It's just that Digimon are very shy
when it comes to meeting others.
But if you help them, you'll be able 
to make more and more friends.

original:
Plus... we can gather more 
information that way, too.
translation:
Plus... we can gather more 
information that way, too.

original:
That's also very important, 
isn't it...
Alright, we'll do what we can to 
help them trust us.
translation:
That's also very important, 
isn't it...
Alright, we'll do what we can to 
help them trust us.

original:
Please do! 
And good luck!
I'm sure all the Digimon will really
grow to like you!
translation:
Please do! 
And good luck!
I'm sure all the Digimon will really
grow to like you!

original: That's right! They'll really like you!
translation: That's right! They'll really like you!

original:
Somehow it's more irritating when 
its coming from you, Hiroyuki.
translation:
Somehow it's more irritating when 
its coming from you, Hiroyuki.

original:
Leave Mr.Super-something to us!

And we'll work on repairing the 
Evolution System and DigiShip too!
translation:
Leave Mr.Super-something to us!

And we'll work on repairing the 
Evolution System and DigiShip too!

original: Got it.
translation: Got it.

original: Let's go, ^P！
translation: Let's go, ^P！

original:
^P! Asuka! T-t-t-this is 
terrible!
Hiroyuki suddenly took off in the 
DigiShip!
translation:
^P! Asuka! T-t-t-this is 
terrible!
Hiroyuki suddenly took off in the 
DigiShip!

original:
That idiot... I bet he's gone off to
look for Yui and Takuto.
Why couldn't he just wait for us...
translation:
That idiot... I bet he's gone off to
look for Yui and Takuto.
Why couldn't he just wait for us...

original:
It's crazy however you look at it! 
I mean, rumor has it...
the Selectors have already taken
over South Bridge!
translation:
It's crazy however you look at it! 
I mean, rumor has it...
the Selectors have already taken
over South Bridge!

original:
Do you know where Hiroyuki is 
now?
translation:
Do you know where Hiroyuki is 
now?

original:
It should be possible to figure out
Hiroyuki's location...
since the ship emits a signal as 
it's moving.
translation:
It should be possible to figure out
Hiroyuki's location...
since the ship emits a signal as 
it's moving.

original:
Hey! Patamon! What happened to
the DigiShip?!
We just received a strange signal
coming from South Bridge, but...
...Huh?

Wait. If you're here, ^P... 
who's in the ship?
translation:
Hey! Patamon! What happened to
the DigiShip?!
We just received a strange signal
coming from South Bridge, but...
...Huh?

Wait. If you're here, ^P... 
who's in the ship?

original:
...Hiroyuki.

I had just finished setting the 
address to South Bridge...
I only took my eyes off him for a 
second, and he was gone.
translation:
...Hiroyuki.

I had just finished setting the 
address to South Bridge...
I only took my eyes off him for a 
second, and he was gone.

original:
It's not your fault, Patamon!

That idiot is always acting like this,
always causing trouble without 
any consideration for others.
He goes around causing a fuss and
annoying everyone.
He never stops to think about how
his actions will affect others.
It's probably for the best that you
took your eyes off of him, Patamon.
Otherwise you'd probably be stuck
on that ship with him right now!
translation:
It's not your fault, Patamon!

That idiot is always acting like this,
always causing trouble without 
any consideration for others.
He goes around causing a fuss and
annoying everyone.
He never stops to think about how
his actions will affect others.
It's probably for the best that you
took your eyes off of him, Patamon.
Otherwise you'd probably be stuck
on that ship with him right now!

original:
...Hey, does Hiroyuki even know 
how to pilot the ship?
He'll be alright... won't he...?
translation:
...Hey, does Hiroyuki even know 
how to pilot the ship?
He'll be alright... won't he...?

original:
H-he'll be fine, I'm sure! He may 
be stupid...
But he's got some surprisingly
good reflexes.
If something were to happen, 
I doubt he'd get hurt.
translation:
H-he'll be fine, I'm sure! He may 
be stupid...
But he's got some surprisingly
good reflexes.
If something were to happen, 
I doubt he'd get hurt.

original:
I-is that so...?

Well, if push comes to shove, the
Autopilot should kick in...
As long as nothing else goes 
wrong...
translation:
I-is that so...?

Well, if push comes to shove, the
Autopilot should kick in...
As long as nothing else goes 
wrong...

original:
Wait, that sound... was that the 
DigiShip returning?!
translation:
Wait, that sound... was that the 
DigiShip returning?!

original:
Patamon! Be careful!

We don't know what the situation 
is inside it yet!
translation:
Patamon! Be careful!

We don't know what the situation 
is inside it yet!

original:
This is terrible...
Everything's ruined...
translation:
This is terrible...
Everything's ruined...

original: Huh? Is it broken?
translation: Huh? Is it broken?

original: Could it have crashed again?
translation: Could it have crashed again?

original:
No, no, the ship itself seems fine, 
but...
The location data of South Bridge...
all of the access points...
They've all been erased from the
ship's system... why..?
translation:
No, no, the ship itself seems fine, 
but...
The location data of South Bridge...
all of the access points...
They've all been erased from the
ship's system... why..?

original:
H-huh?!

B-but hey! The ship returned 
safely at least!
So we've managed to avoid the 
worst possible situation, right?
translation:
H-huh?!

B-but hey! The ship returned 
safely at least!
So we've managed to avoid the 
worst possible situation, right?

original: So... what about Hiroyuki?
translation: So... what about Hiroyuki?

original: ...There's no one on the ship.
translation: ...There's no one on the ship.

original:
What does he think he's doing, that
stupid airhead!
^P! Let's take the ship 
and follow Hiroyuki!
When we find that idiot, we'll have
to teach him a lesson!
translation:
What does he think he's doing, that
stupid airhead!
^P! Let's take the ship 
and follow Hiroyuki!
When we find that idiot, we'll have
to teach him a lesson!

original:
The address has been erased 
from the DigiShip's system...
And the DigiPort in the area is still
unopened.
Therefore, if you want to go to 
South Bridge,
You'll need to go and open the gate
manually before you can fly there.
translation:
The address has been erased 
from the DigiShip's system...
And the DigiPort in the area is still
unopened.
Therefore, if you want to go to 
South Bridge,
You'll need to go and open the gate
manually before you can fly there.

original:
What? So in order to fly to 
South Bridge, we'd now have to 
already be there first somehow?

That doesn't make any sense...
Are you saying it's impossible?
Then how are we supposed to go
after Hiroyuki...?
translation:
What? So in order to fly to 
South Bridge, we'd now have to 
already be there first somehow?

That doesn't make any sense...
Are you saying it's impossible?
Then how are we supposed to go
after Hiroyuki...?

original:
I have an idea!

If you can find Armadillomon, I'm 
sure you can figure something out!
You might have heard this before,
but...
A Digging Digimon on your team can
help you reach South Bridge!
Why don't you go to Login Mountain
and ask Armadillomon about it?
translation:
I have an idea!

If you can find Armadillomon, I'm 
sure you can figure something out!
You might have heard this before,
but...
A Digging Digimon on your team can
help you reach South Bridge!
Why don't you go to Login Mountain
and ask Armadillomon about it?

original:
Alright... ^P!

Let's head to Login Mountain and 
find Armadillomon!
translation:
Alright... ^P!

Let's head to Login Mountain and 
find Armadillomon!

original:
Hehehehe. Quests! Quests!♪
Everyone's got "Quests" for 
^P♪
I better hurry and let ^P 
know!♪
translation:
Hehehehe. Quests! Quests!♪
Everyone's got "Quests" for 
^P♪
I better hurry and let ^P 
know!♪

original:
Hey, ^P! Lookie here!♪

You've already received Quests 
through the Quest PC!
translation:
Hey, ^P! Lookie here!♪

You've already received Quests 
through the Quest PC!

original:
Other Digimon are very 
curious about you, ^P♪
If you help them out, I'm sure 
they'll come to like you.
That's why I'll leave it to you, 
^P! Do your best!
translation:
Other Digimon are very 
curious about you, ^P♪
If you help them out, I'm sure 
they'll come to like you.
That's why I'll leave it to you, 
^P! Do your best!

original:
If you want to know the details of 
your current Quest...
Just press the Start or X Button 
to open the Menu screen.
There, you can see all you need to
know♪
translation:
If you want to know the details of 
your current Quest...
Just press the Start or X Button 
to open the Menu screen.
There, you can see all you need to
know♪

original: Hey, wait a minute, ^P!
translation: Hey, wait a minute, ^P!

original:
Why don't you give the Repair
Console a try?
If you don't repair Plates through
the Repair Console...
We won't ever be able to fix the 
Evolution Tree!
translation:
Why don't you give the Repair
Console a try?
If you don't repair Plates through
the Repair Console...
We won't ever be able to fix the 
Evolution Tree!

original:
Thanks for all your hard work,
^P!
translation:
Thanks for all your hard work,
^P!

original:
Now we can finally use this 
DigiPort!♪
translation:
Now we can finally use this 
DigiPort!♪

original:
Thanks to you, we were able to
retrieve the DigiShip, ^P!
The repair and maintenance are
progressing well!
translation:
Thanks to you, we were able to
retrieve the DigiShip, ^P!
The repair and maintenance are
progressing well!

original:
You've already opened that 
DigiPort for us, haven't you?
If you continue to open up more
and more DigiPorts...
You'll be able to travel to each
location much easier!
I'm so excited!♪

With you around, it feels like 
everything will work out!♪
translation:
You've already opened that 
DigiPort for us, haven't you?
If you continue to open up more
and more DigiPorts...
You'll be able to travel to each
location much easier!
I'm so excited!♪

With you around, it feels like 
everything will work out!♪

original:
Everyone's counting on you,
so good luck!
translation:
Everyone's counting on you,
so good luck!

original:
Hey, ^P, take a look!♪

You've received more Quests 
through the Quest PC!
The Digimon are growing more and
more curious about you!
I'm sure if you keep helping, they'll
grow quite fond of you.
So just do your best, ^P!
If you get stuck at any time during
a Quest...
Just press the X Button or Start
Button to open the menu.
There you can check the details♪
translation:
Hey, ^P, take a look!♪

You've received more Quests 
through the Quest PC!
The Digimon are growing more and
more curious about you!
I'm sure if you keep helping, they'll
grow quite fond of you.
So just do your best, ^P!
If you get stuck at any time during
a Quest...
Just press the X Button or Start
Button to open the menu.
There you can check the details♪

original:
^P...

This looks like a good spot to dig
a hole.
But it's not like we can dig a hole,
ourselves, now can we?
We should find a Digimon with the
'Dig' skill.
You'll need to have it in the party
in order to use the skill.
translation:
^P...

This looks like a good spot to dig
a hole.
But it's not like we can dig a hole,
ourselves, now can we?
We should find a Digimon with the
'Dig' skill.
You'll need to have it in the party
in order to use the skill.

original:
Hey ^P...

You have a Digimon with 'Dig' in 
your party right now, correct?
translation:
Hey ^P...

You have a Digimon with 'Dig' in 
your party right now, correct?

original:
Good, then let's go.♪

If we go through this hole, we'll
eventually reach the underground!
translation:
Good, then let's go.♪

If we go through this hole, we'll
eventually reach the underground!

original:
Is this South Bridge?

It's a more tranquil of a place than
I expected.
translation:
Is this South Bridge?

It's a more tranquil of a place than
I expected.

original:
^P, Asuka, have you 
managed to reach South Bridge?
translation:
^P, Asuka, have you 
managed to reach South Bridge?

original:
If there's a DigiPort there, don't 
forget to open it, alright?
If you do that, the address will be
recorded.
translation:
If there's a DigiPort there, don't 
forget to open it, alright?
If you do that, the address will be
recorded.

original:
With the address, we won't have
to travel underground anymore?
translation:
With the address, we won't have
to travel underground anymore?

original:
Yup. From then onwards, you can
simply use the DigiShip.
There should be a key in a box
somewhere nearby. Try to find it.
translation:
Yup. From then onwards, you can
simply use the DigiShip.
There should be a key in a box
somewhere nearby. Try to find it.

original:
Got it! We'll go find the key.

Then we can open up the DigiPort's
gate!
translation:
Got it! We'll go find the key.

Then we can open up the DigiPort's
gate!

original:
Just be careful not to get
separated over there.
The fact that the addresses were
deleted from the ship's system...
Someone did that on purpose, 
that much we know for sure.
translation:
Just be careful not to get
separated over there.
The fact that the addresses were
deleted from the ship's system...
Someone did that on purpose, 
that much we know for sure.

original:
Do you think that goes for 
Hiroyuki's disappearance too?
That that same someone took 
him and sent the ship back?
translation:
Do you think that goes for 
Hiroyuki's disappearance too?
That that same someone took 
him and sent the ship back?

original:
You two are ^P and 
Asuka, right?
translation:
You two are ^P and 
Asuka, right?

original:
...Who are you guys?

How do you know our names?
translation:
...Who are you guys?

How do you know our names?

original:
Your ally asked us to come
and get you.
They said you'd understand if we
told you that, and come with us.
So hurry up and come with us.
translation:
Your ally asked us to come
and get you.
They said you'd understand if we
told you that, and come with us.
So hurry up and come with us.

original:
Our ally? Well, we ARE missing 
three of our friends, but...
Who told you this? Who asked you
to come here?
translation:
Our ally? Well, we ARE missing 
three of our friends, but...
Who told you this? Who asked you
to come here?

original:
Your ally told us. They told us
to bring you with us.
They said you'd absolutely 
understand if we said that!
translation:
Your ally told us. They told us
to bring you with us.
They said you'd absolutely 
understand if we said that!

original:
It doesn't look like they 
understand what we're saying...?
Even though we asked who
these so-called 'allies' are...
translation:
It doesn't look like they 
understand what we're saying...?
Even though we asked who
these so-called 'allies' are...

original:
Your ally told us to bring you
back with us.
They told us to do everything in
our power to bring you back.
So you must...

Come with us!
translation:
Your ally told us to bring you
back with us.
They told us to do everything in
our power to bring you back.
So you must...

Come with us!

original:
To attack an ally's friends...

We can never be allies 
with someone like that!
Traitors! We'll get you for this!
translation:
To attack an ally's friends...

We can never be allies 
with someone like that!
Traitors! We'll get you for this!

original: Hey! Wait! Who put you up to this!?
translation: Hey! Wait! Who put you up to this!?

original:
Kyaaah! Wait, what are you doing?!

Stop! Let go of me! Let go, you
idiots!
translation:
Kyaaah! Wait, what are you doing?!

Stop! Let go of me! Let go, you
idiots!

original:
You aren't our ally! There's only 
one we can call that!
Returning with just one is 
sufficient...
We have no use for you.
translation:
You aren't our ally! There's only 
one we can call that!
Returning with just one is 
sufficient...
We have no use for you.

original:
Enough already, guys! Stop this!

Stop being so jittery and explain 
things more clearly!
translation:
Enough already, guys! Stop this!

Stop being so jittery and explain 
things more clearly!

original:
We told you, the one calling for you
is not an enemy!
They're your ally! Why don't you
get that!?
translation:
We told you, the one calling for you
is not an enemy!
They're your ally! Why don't you
get that!?

original:
We don't have any interest, let 
alone a grudge against you!
Plus, it's not like we wanted to
touch your flabby body, get it?
translation:
We don't have any interest, let 
alone a grudge against you!
Plus, it's not like we wanted to
touch your flabby body, get it?

original:
F...flabby!? That's it!

Who isn't squishy in comparison to
tough-shelled bugs like you?!
translation:
F...flabby!? That's it!

Who isn't squishy in comparison to
tough-shelled bugs like you?!

original:
Enough of this, we'll just carry you
there, ourselves.
Hurry up and catch that child!
translation:
Enough of this, we'll just carry you
there, ourselves.
Hurry up and catch that child!

original: Ouch! Why are you resisting!
translation: Ouch! Why are you resisting!

original:
Isn't it obvious I'd resist?!

If you come any closer, I'll rip those
beetle horns of yours right off!
translation:
Isn't it obvious I'd resist?!

If you come any closer, I'll rip those
beetle horns of yours right off!

original: Stop this, Kuwagamon!
translation: Stop this, Kuwagamon!

original:
Our Tamer would not appreciate
such violent behaviour.
You were told to find and bring 
back these guys... weren't you?
translation:
Our Tamer would not appreciate
such violent behaviour.
You were told to find and bring 
back these guys... weren't you?

original:
That's what we tried to tell them
but they refused to listen!
It's not like we hurt them, did we?
translation:
That's what we tried to tell them
but they refused to listen!
It's not like we hurt them, did we?

original: ^P! Help me!
translation: ^P! Help me!

original: So you're ^P?
translation: So you're ^P?

original:
We've come here on a mission 
from our Tamer.
In order for us to decide if you can 
return with us,
I'll ask you to confirm right here 
and now,
translation:
We've come here on a mission 
from our Tamer.
In order for us to decide if you can 
return with us,
I'll ask you to confirm right here 
and now,

original:
Are you friend, or foe? Answer me,
^P!
translation:
Are you friend, or foe? Answer me,
^P!

original: Are you WarGrowlmon's friend?
translation: Are you WarGrowlmon's friend?

original: Of course I am!
translation: Of course I am!

original: That's absurd...
translation: That's absurd...

original:
Hmph... I simply cannot believe
that.
I'll ask you once more, are you 
friend? Or are you foe?
translation:
Hmph... I simply cannot believe
that.
I'll ask you once more, are you 
friend? Or are you foe?

original:
I see. I'll be sure to tell 
that to our Tamer...

That their only surviving ally is 
Asuka!
translation:
I see. I'll be sure to tell 
that to our Tamer...

That their only surviving ally is 
Asuka!

original:
It's clear that you are our enemy.

I'll bring Asuka back to our Tamer.

Don't bother following.
translation:
It's clear that you are our enemy.

I'll bring Asuka back to our Tamer.

Don't bother following.

original:
Hold it! One more step and I won't
hesitate to attack!
I don't know what the Selectors 
have sent you here for, but...
I won't let you hurt my friends!
translation:
Hold it! One more step and I won't
hesitate to attack!
I don't know what the Selectors 
have sent you here for, but...
I won't let you hurt my friends!

original:
Stop right there! Make one move 
and I won't hesitate to attack!
I don't know what the Selectors 
have sent you here for, but...
I will not allow you to come
anywhere near my friends!
translation:
Stop right there! Make one move 
and I won't hesitate to attack!
I don't know what the Selectors 
have sent you here for, but...
I will not allow you to come
anywhere near my friends!

original:
I suggest you leave quietly and
forget what you saw here.
Or else I'll be forced to make you
forget!
Make your choice!
translation:
I suggest you leave quietly and
forget what you saw here.
Or else I'll be forced to make you
forget!
Make your choice!

original:
Will you calmly back off and forget
you ever saw this place?
Or will I be forced to beat the 
memories out of you?
Make your choice!
translation:
Will you calmly back off and forget
you ever saw this place?
Or will I be forced to beat the 
memories out of you?
Make your choice!

original: How will you answer?
translation: How will you answer?

original: I'll forget everything!
translation: I'll forget everything!

original: Have you seen my friends?
translation: Have you seen my friends?

original:
You can't expect me to believe 
that, can you?
translation:
You can't expect me to believe 
that, can you?

original:
There's no way I can believe that!
Do you think I'm stupid?!
translation:
There's no way I can believe that!
Do you think I'm stupid?!

original:
If you're not going to listen to what
I'm saying...
Then I won't bother listening to
your story, either.
translation:
If you're not going to listen to what
I'm saying...
Then I won't bother listening to
your story, either.

original:
So you're the type who doesn't 
listen to what others have to say?
Then I won't listen to what you've 
got to say, either!
translation:
So you're the type who doesn't 
listen to what others have to say?
Then I won't listen to what you've 
got to say, either!

original:
I'm sorry, but I simply can't let
you go free, now.
translation:
I'm sorry, but I simply can't let
you go free, now.

original:
It's too bad, but I cannot allow you
to leave, now.
translation:
It's too bad, but I cannot allow you
to leave, now.

original:
I can't believe it...

How could I lose so easily...

Why would such a powerful Tamer 
be with the Selectors...?
translation:
I can't believe it...

How could I lose so easily...

Why would such a powerful Tamer 
be with the Selectors...?

original:
Impossible...!

There's no way I could lose so
easily...!
Why is such a powerful Tamer
working with the Selectors...?!
translation:
Impossible...!

There's no way I could lose so
easily...!
Why is such a powerful Tamer
working with the Selectors...?!

original:
Could it be... you're not actually
working with them...?
translation:
Could it be... you're not actually
working with them...?

original:
Wait, no way... you're not working
with them?!
translation:
Wait, no way... you're not working
with them?!

original:
You came here from North Bridge
DigiBase in search of your friend?
Could you be referring to...

...Hiroyuki?
translation:
You came here from North Bridge
DigiBase in search of your friend?
Could you be referring to...

...Hiroyuki?

original:
You came here from North Bridge
DigiBase to look for your friend?
You don't mean...

...Hiroyuki?
translation:
You came here from North Bridge
DigiBase to look for your friend?
You don't mean...

...Hiroyuki?

original:
You're asking how I know about 
him?
That's because we've been taking
care of him for a while now.
translation:
You're asking how I know about 
him?
That's because we've been taking
care of him for a while now.

original:
How do I know the guy...?

He's been hanging out with us for
a while now, y'know.
translation:
How do I know the guy...?

He's been hanging out with us for
a while now, y'know.
